author: aniketpr01
content:
Hey Folks, 
I am running geth testnet in dev mode, and machine went down, i do not want to loose all the accounts that were creating when it was running, 
how to fetch all accounts, transaction from datastore/datadir location ? is there any library or script reference?

author: .fjl
content: If you have a datadir, you can just launch geth on it with `--datadir` to interact with the database

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: If you didn't have a datadir, we will use a memory database, meaning all data is gone once the node is shutdown
